channel.title: How do I add pictures to my servers info on Status Checker
channel.description: I put my server up on mopar status checker but i dont know how to show in-game pictures from my server. Help? [img][/img] i dont know what to put between those img things

item.title: How do I add pictures to my servers info on Status Checker
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I suggest reading http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode
You are supposed to put a direct link to your pictures which you have uploaded to the internet between the img tags.
http://tinypic.com/ is a site where you can upload pictures, it will even provide the link with img tags after uploading.

Next time you have a question concerning the status page please use [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.0.html]this topic[/img]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add pictures to my servers info on Status Checker
